name: Eve: Before Man
description:
Eve: Before Man is a retro action platformer. This is an early demo build featuring:

-Levels 1-5-

-Open travel between levels-

-Boss fight-

-Ability upgrade-

-Weapon upgrade-

This is an early showcase, and many many more features are going to be added. As well as the one included are subject to change.

WAD - move

S - crouch

Space/Left Click - shoot

ARROWS - navigate menu

ENTER - select option
